events.desc: Pendleton Companies founded in Phoenix, AZ with a vision to build a vertically integrated real estate enterprise. First acquisition was a 48-unit apartment community in Tempe, AZ.
Pendleton Lending established to provide competitive financing solutions for the company's growing portfolio and select third-party clients.
Pendleton Construction launched, allowing the company to self-perform general contracting on development projects and control quality from the ground up.
Through prudent underwriting and strong operations, Pendleton Companies navigated the financial crisis and emerged as a stronger, more diversified platform.
Milestone achievement of 1,000 units under management across Arizona and Colorado, marking a decade of steady growth.
Strategic expansion into the Texas markets with acquisitions in Dallas and Austin, extending the platform into one of the nation's fastest-growing metros.
Launch of first large-scale mixed-use development combining retail, office, and residential in a live-work-play environment.
Entered the Nashville, TN market with a 96-unit mixed-use development, expanding to four states of operations.
Pendleton Companies surpasses 5,000 units owned and managed across five states â€” a testament to 28 years of disciplined growth.
